data.title: Kunle Afolayan's epic 'Anikulapo' series confirmed: Get ready for a historical adventure!
data.meta_description: Renowned Nigerian filmmaker, Kunle Afolayan, has officially announced that production has begun on the highly anticipated series
data.text:
Renowned Nigerian filmmaker, Kunle Afolayan, has officially announced that production has begun on the highly anticipated series, “Anikulapo”!

A teaser video was recently posted on his Instagram page, confirming the news. The series, which is both produced and directed by Afolayan, features Kunle Remi as the lead actor and is set in the historic Oyo kingdom. The story revolves around a young man’s quest for better opportunities in life.

The cast of “Anikulapo” is an ensemble of talented actors, including Sola Sobowale, Bimbo Ademoye, Aisha Lawal, Kareem Adepoju, Adebayo Salami, Faithia Balogun, Taiwo Hassan, Moji Olayiwola, Hakeem Kae-Kazim, and Eyiyemi Afolayan.

Fans of Kunle Afolayan are eagerly anticipating the continuation of Anukulapo.
